title: Can't see club tags on offline players
body:
Was promoting members in the club who actually use the club tag, but can't see tags on offline players.
Please fix this.

replies.body: It looks like there are some issues with clubs right now per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Let me know if this is fixed up after the issues are resolved.  In the meantime, wait for them to come online and see if you can see their tags.
